array.string: CREATE TABLE Employees(INTEGER ID UNIQUE AUTOINCREMENT, TEXT NAME, TEXT POSITION);
SELECT SECTOR, TYPE, ID, NAME, COUNT(*) AS NUMBER FROM F0101 INNER JOIN F0006 ON F0006.ID = F0101.ID WHERE ID=? OR SECTOR = ? OR TYPE = ? GROUP BY SECTOR HAVING NUMBER > ? ORDER BY SECTOR
SELECT SECTOR, TYPE, ID, NAME, COUNT(*) AS NUMBER FROM F0101 INNER JOIN F0006 ON F0006.ID = F0101.ID WHERE ID=? OR SECTOR = ? OR TYPE = ? GROUP BY SECTOR HAVING NUMBER > ? ORDER BY SECTOR
